mapper.select: SELECT a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_PRICE, b.* FROM PET_ITEM a, PET_ITEM_ORDER b WHERE b.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND a.ITEM_NO = b.ITEM_NO
SELECT a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_PRICE, b.* FROM PET_ITEM a, PET_ITEM_ORDER b WHERE b.ORDER_NO = ORDER_NO_SEQ.CURRVAL AND b.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND a.ITEM_NO = b.ITEM_NO
mapper.insert: insert into PET_ITEM_ORDER (ORDER_NO, ITEM_NO, ORDER_BUYCOUNT, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_IMG) values(ORDER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ITEM_NO}, #{ORDER_BUYCOUNT}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{ORDER_PRICE}, #{ORDER_STATE}, #{ORDER_DATE}, #{ORDER_TYPE}, #{ORDER_IMG})
